BDA

Class Facebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • BDA.Facebook

  • public class Facebook
extends java.lang.Object
    Facebook App.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Facebook()
      Constructor, it initializes both attributes: the access token and the Facebook Client.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Facebook

        public Facebook()
        Constructor, it initializes both attributes: the access token and the Facebook Client.

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeLinePosts

        public void getTimeLinePosts()
        Connects the Facebook Client with the posts of the user's time line. Scrolls through all the posts of all the pages of the user's time line. Filters the posts: they must have something written and have the word "esta" also written there. Counts each post and filtered post. Prints the number, id, time when it was created and message of each filtered post. Prints the number of filtered and total number of posts covered.

      • useExtendedAccessToken

        public void useExtendedAccessToken()
        Creates an access token with an extended expired date with the use of the AppId and AppSecret. It uses the new token to create a new Facebook Client.

      • getUserInformation

        public void getUserInformation()
        Prints the user's id, name, email and home town.

      • getLikedPages

        public void getLikedPages()
        Scrolls through all the pages the user likes. Counts each page. Prints the number, id and number of likes of each page. Prints the total number of pages covered.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
